mapper.select: SELECT site_id, site_name, site_code, description, site_master FROM site_info;

SET TIMEZONE TO '${time_zone}'; SELECT info.seq, info.user_site_id, info.user_id, COALESCE(info.user_name,'') AS user_name, COALESCE(info.user_phone_num,'') AS user_phone_num, info.apply_site_id, site.site_name as apply_site_name, info.apply_static_ip_type, COALESCE(info.apply_static_ipaddr,'') AS apply_static_ipaddr, COALESCE(info.apply_static_ip_num,0) AS apply_static_ip_num, COALESCE(to_char(info.apply_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS apply_start_time, COALESCE(to_char(info.apply_end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS apply_end_time, COALESCE(info.apply_description,'') AS apply_description, COALESCE(to_char(info.apply_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS apply_time, COALESCE(info.settlement_status,0) AS settlement_status, COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_id,'') AS settlement_chief_id, COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_name,'') AS settlement_chief_name, COALESCE(info.settlement_description,'') AS settlement_description, COALESCE(to_char(info.settlement_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS settlement_time, COALESCE(info.issuance_ip_type,'') AS issuance_ip_type, COALESCE(info.issuance_ipaddr,'') AS issuance_ipaddr, COALESCE(info.issuance_ip_num,0) AS issuance_ip_num, COALESCE(to_char(info.issuance_start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS issuance_start_time, COALESCE(to_char(info.issuance_end_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS issuance_end_time, COALESCE(to_char(info.insert_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS insert_date, COALESCE(to_char(info.modify_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS modify_date, rowcount.allcount FROM user_apply_ip_info AS info, site_info AS site, (SELECT count(*) allcount FROM user_apply_ip_info AS info WHERE info.user_id = #{user_id} and info.user_site_id = ${user_site_id} AND info.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.user_phone_num like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_static_ip_type like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_static_ipaddr like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_description like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_id, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_name, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_description, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.issuance_ip_type, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.issuance_ipaddr, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') ) AS rowcount WHERE info.user_id = #{user_id} and info.user_site_id = ${user_site_id} AND info.user_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.user_phone_num like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_static_ip_type like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_static_ipaddr like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND info.apply_description like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_id, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_chief_name, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.settlement_description, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.issuance_ip_type, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND COALESCE(info.issuance_ipaddr, '') like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') AND site.site_id = info.apply_site_id ORDER BY ${orderColumn} ${orderType} offset #{startIndex} limit #{length};
